name: James FINNEGAN v. MEMORIAL HOSPITAL et al.

parties: James FINNEGAN v. MEMORIAL HOSPITAL et al.

opinions.text:
ORDER
The defendants’ motion to affirm the judgment of the Superior Court pursuant to’ Rule 16(g) is granted.

attorneys: John F. McBurney, Pawtucket, for plaintiff.
David W. Carroll, Joseph A. Kelly, Providence, for defendant.
casebody.head_matter:
James FINNEGAN v. MEMORIAL HOSPITAL et al.
No. 82-280-A.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
Feb. 25, 1983.
John F. McBurney, Pawtucket, for plaintiff.
David W. Carroll, Joseph A. Kelly, Providence, for defendant.
